name: Johnny Saves The Penguins!
description:
Controls: 

- WASD for movement

- Spacebar to create a snowman. (The snowmen are created at the end of the mouses cursor)

Goal: Get the penguins to their safe house away from the evil Krampus!

Made for Minijam Gamejam: Krampus never stops chasing Johnny and never stops creating more of himself to assist in capturing you and the penguins.

- If Krampus eats a penguin his speed increases

- Every so often Krampus goes into Rage mode and can pass through solid objects

- Snowmen freeze Krampus for a while and slows him back down
